title: Another Crab's Treasure
tags: Souls-like,3D Platformer,Funny,Action RPG,Nonlinear,Atmospheric,Cartoony,Third Person,Action-Adventure,RPG,Dark Fantasy,Dark Humor,Cute,3D,Open World,Lore-Rich,Underwater,Beat 'em up,Story Rich,Action
description: In a vibrant undersea kingdom on the verge of collapse, a hermit crab embarks on a treasure hunt to buy back his repossessed shell. The second game from AGGRO CRAB.
